form.title: Large Test Form for Performance Testing (~500KB)

metadata.description: This form contains many pages, sections, and fields to test performance with large JSON payloads. Target size is approximately 500KB. This form is used for integration testing and performance benchmarking.
metadata.author: Test Suite - Automated Generation
metadata.purpose: Performance Testing and Large JSON Payload Validation
metadata.notes: Generated automatically for SQL Server integration testing. Tests JSON serialization/deserialization performance and database storage of large payloads.
